SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!Common logging
!Server URL :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server URL" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_K8S_BASE_URL# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Username :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_K8S_USERNAME# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Kube Config Path :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Kube Config Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_K8S_CONFIG_PATH# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Kube Config Context :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Kube Config Context" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_K8S_CONTEXT# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Cluster :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Cluster" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_K8S_CLUSTER# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Skip TLS Verification :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Skip TLS Verification" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_K8S_SKIP_CERT# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Client Certificate Path :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Client Certificate Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_K8S_CERT_PATH# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
